ref.mixed-citation: Meehl GA, Stocker TF, Collins WD, Friedlingstein P, Gaye AT, Gregory JM, Kitoh A, Knutti R, Murphy JM, Noda A, Rapier SCB, Watterson IG, Weaver AJ, Zhao ZC (2007) The physical science basis.
